products.full_description: The time is now for it to be okay to be great. People in this world shun people for being great. For being a bright color. For standing out.
products.details: There’s nothing I really wanted to do in life that I wasn’t able to get good at. That’s my skill. I’m not really specifically talented at anything except for the ability to learn.
